Job Description: What you'll do:          Design and development of new features on BTS/nodeB/eNodbe         Writing system and design specification and unit test plan         Taking the ownership of the feature and work with cross functional teams to successful delivery of the feature         Understanding of end to end scenario and troubleshooting/fixing of field and QA reported issues     What you must have:          Minimum 06-10 years experience in 1 RAT development         Protocol development experience in GSM/GPRS/WCDMA/HSPA/LTE/LTE advance         Strong hold on C, C++, SW architecture         Good understanding of best practice software engineering processes, version control, testing and release cycles         Strong communication skills         Excellent understanding of 3GPP standards         Solid understanding of Linux OS internals, TCP/IP, multi-threading         Excellent verbal and written communication skills are required         Strong analytical and troubleshooting skills     Education:    Parallel Wireless is the leading U.S.-based company challenging the world s legacy vendors with the industry s only unified ALL G (5G/4G/3G/2G) software-enabled OpenRAN solutions. Its cloud-native OpenRAN and network architectures redefine network economics for global mobile operators in both coverage and capacity deployments, while also paving the way to 5G.
Functional Area: IT Software - Embedded, EDA, VLSI, ASIC, Chip Design,
UG: B.Tech/B.E. in Production/Industrial, Any Graduate in Any Specialization
PG: M.Tech in Electronics/Telecommunication, Any Postgraduate in Any Specialization
